entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southeast 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 4 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain changing to rain and ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023
